PrecisAppointment of KPMG LLP of Toronto, Ontario, as auditor of Atomic Energy of Canada Limited for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2009; and appointment of the Auditor General of Canada as joint auditor of Atomic Energy of Canada for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2009.
